trackinfo.title: Grief & Its Due I
trackinfo.lyrics: This perpetual emptiness, everlasting.  From a heart crowned with sorrow, to a void widely expanding.  I never cherished the value of a moment until it became a memory.  Coasting through the darkness with a dim lit bearing.  These eyes blur reflections from the damp  and cold dealings.  My survival was not a mistake.  I have found that fleeting pleasure, so distant and free.  The gift of another dream, so lavish and cold.  Avarice hearts in a room so unclear.  No sooner said than done.  No sooner said than done.  A blind compassion for my plight.  Thus it is within the grief for the devout soul to mourn its due.  Mourn its due.  Mourn its due.  Empathy through silence, for all the departed.

trackinfo.title: Grief & Its Due II
trackinfo.lyrics: Everything became so bleak and silent.  The warmth came and gone.  I am left with only the artistry to forget.  From each cut and color you would portray.  To lose touch, to lose feeling.  All for the betterment to sustain.  Pillars built in love, corroding in forsaken words.  You wanted this. Through skin and blood.  I know I am not yours to love.  Like the wind it came gallant and eminent.  Hands encased in gold, Leaving a child’s life in pain.  Refusing the very nature of our kin.  I want a guide through these moments in life.  You were never there and never to be here.  I drift alone and forgotten even after my soul expires.  I hope you never feel the warmth of day.  Tearing you away from the very home that you built in vain.  Your vulgar silence echoes in my head, Draping over my eyes and fading skin.  Forever in waiting for a finality while dreaming in reverse.  Forever depending on infinity and our absolution.  Bring me back to when I had the strength  to leave it all behind before the light of another day.

trackinfo.title: the light that brims the clouds
trackinfo.lyrics: In another life Somewhere raining so blue as we would dream In the light above I find my solace As we travel through  Where light sleeps on puddles Somehow through the clouds  I am engulfed by the hum Of a grey daze These turquoise walls Pressed cold against my skin Through a window of fog Waiting to find you where the clouds break I’ve always wondered what lies beyond what I see Hidden corners with stories so vast Where light sleeps On puddles Somehow through the clouds Hold you in me You breathe in me Hold you in me You breathe in me Hold you in me Bathe in my light  Two hands stretching forth  Too small to reach Two hands stretching forth In another life Somewhere raining so blue as we would dream In the light above I find my solace As we travel through  Over bridges and lakes beyond my travel Where somehow the light reaches me  And it shimmers from afar
trackinfo.credits: from that lasts forever, released July 8, 2025

trackinfo.title: something in the distance
trackinfo.credits: from that lasts forever, released July 8, 2025

trackinfo.title: my heart is your home
trackinfo.lyrics: See the view of the sunlight engulfing the sky Orange light from a dream I’ve been trying to chase Come to me This is home why would you run away Please stay here, I don’t want to change a thing Give me forever looking back was it worth everything that we lost spew hatred did the words reflect our hearts see myself from a distance and i understand  watching you as your words become my wings I want To be Your life Your heart Your blood Your tears Your dreams Your dreams I see you in the blinding rain I watch it pour for hours Replaying warm moments stained in me Fading into gaussian blur I watched you walk into the rain Watching you as your words become My wings, my wings Become my wings I watched you walk into the rain Fading into gaussian blur See the view of the sunlight engulfing the sky Orange light from a dream I’ve been trying to chase Come to me This is home why would you run away Please stay here, I dont want to change a thing I don’t want to change a thing I don’t want you to change, to change I just want you to come back home I don’t want you to change, to change  I just want you to cone back home  And I’ll wait here And I’ll wait right here Please don’t forget what we have built Please decide I can’t keep hanging on this line I want to show you we can fly And it’s a pull we can’t defy And it’s a pull we can’t defy I want to show you we can fly I want to show you we can fly And it’s a pull we can’t deny And it’s a pull we can’t deny Take the words from my lungs And hold my hands so cold, lead me Take the light from my eyes It’s all i’ve ever known Take me away I would wait right here forever if that’s what it takes Just to show you that you’re everything to me I would say i’m sorry but it doesn’t fix everything  Please come home now, it’s been too long My heart’s your home, it’s where you belong Dreams of those years, you were right here My heart’s your home, it’s where you belong…
trackinfo.credits: from that lasts forever, released July 8, 2025

trackinfo.title: weary
trackinfo.lyrics: Im just so weary Why do you have to be this way It's almost like you never cared anyway You've caused so much affliction The string that held us together Is unweaving, my heart Its falling to pieces I might as well end this myself Lying to my face I will never see How you can truly be so Disgusting Tell me you care But in the end we both know you hide what's true If someone was Dying in front of you All you could do  Is care about yourself I used to hold you so close  To my heart But its the very one you tore apart How can a heart like yours be so cold Your own family How could you I fucking loved you
trackinfo.credits: from while you're still, released December 24, 2023

trackinfo.title: abuse
trackinfo.credits: from while you're still, released December 24, 2023

trackinfo.title: another life
trackinfo.lyrics: I, see the coldness in your eyes It feels like someone has ripped, my heart out of my chest Even though, I know it was for the best. Maybe in another life I will see you there I, died inside When you stopped moving; breathing Death, its a part of life But why must it be so painful To see those you love wither in front of you Don't, look so sad You are in a better place now But you aren't with me The pain you were feeling Was so unfair Don't, look so sad Death, its a part of life I, died inside When you stopped moving I, see the coldness in your eyes I, see your in pain Within a week You were already gone I still feel you here What am I going to do without you Things won't be the same I refuse to leave your side Even when you die
trackinfo.credits: from while you're still, released December 24, 2023
